content:
Hi Everyone,
Quick question: I was not able to find a stream dedicated to France. Shall one be created?
Hi Arnoud, CLAIRE/FR has just been created and you are subscrided
Now we should get some of our French supporters to subscribe to this. Arnaud, can you help us spread the word?
Sure. Will do, and keep you posted.

that would be nice! a question for the /fr stream: I was recently asked to help out the DBT for a citizen-engagement survey on AI (which they perform for the Human Brain Project in 14 EU Member States) - we still need a someone to help out on setting up a French 'chapter' (time is pressing). Happy to discuss online or, in person, if you happen to be Lyon in the coming weeks
Hi, as we said to Holger during the GFAIH forum in Paris a few weeks ago, Bordeaux is ready to be much more active in the CLAIRE network.
